description: Creates a security configuration, which is stored in the service and can be specified when a cluster is created.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the security configuration.

parameters.name: SecurityConfiguration
parameters.description: The security configuration details in JSON format. For JSON parameters and examples, see Use Security Configurations to Set Up Cluster Security in the Amazon EMR Management Guide.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the security configuration.

nested_items.name: CreationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the security configuration was created.
